languages.text: "Я никогда не допущу к власти тебе подобных! Язва на теле Империума, будь благодарна, что я еще не спалил{mf||а} тебя в праведном пламени!"

traits.locale_text: "Я никогда не допущу к власти тебе подобных! Язва на теле Империума, будь благодарна, что я еще не спалил{mf||а} тебя в праведном пламени!"

languages.text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"
languages.original_text: "Я никогда не допущу к власти тебе подобных! Язва на теле Империума, будь благодарна, что я еще не спалил{mf||а} тебя в праведном пламени!"

traits.locale_text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"
"I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"
"I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"
"I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"

languages.text: “像你这样的人，我绝不允许你得到真正的权力！你是帝国这个巨人身上的脓疮！你应当感谢至高无上的神皇，因为我还没有把你丢进正义的烈焰中！”
languages.original_text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"

traits.locale_text: “像你这样的人，我绝不允许你得到真正的权力！你是帝国这个巨人身上的脓疮！你应当感谢至高无上的神皇，因为我还没有把你丢进正义的烈焰中！”

languages.text: «¡Nunca permitiré que alguien de tu calaña ponga un solo dedo encima del verdadero poder! Eres una úlcera en el cuerpo del Imperium; ¡da gracias a tu Exaltado de que aún no te haya incinerado con fuego sagrado!».
languages.original_text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Nunca permitiré que alguien de tu calaña ponga un solo dedo encima del verdadero poder! Eres una úlcera en el cuerpo del Imperium; ¡da gracias a tu Exaltado de que aún no te haya incinerado con fuego sagrado!».

languages.text: 「お前のお仲間が真の力に指先すら触れることは許さん！お前は帝国にできた潰瘍だ。正義の炎で焼かれずに済んでいるのはエグザルテッド・ワンのおかげにすぎない！」
languages.original_text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前のお仲間が真の力に指先すら触れることは許さん！お前は帝国にできた潰瘍だ。正義の炎で焼かれずに済んでいるのはエグザルテッド・ワンのおかげにすぎない！」

languages.text: « Jamais je ne laisserais un individu de votre acabit accéder au pouvoir quel qu'il soit ! Vous êtes un chancre purulent sur la face de l'Imperium. Une chance que votre Exalté vous protège, sans quoi je vous aurais déjà brûlée vive dans les flammes sacrées ! »
languages.original_text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"

traits.locale_text: « Jamais je ne laisserais un individu de votre acabit accéder au pouvoir quel qu'il soit ! Vous êtes un chancre purulent sur la face de l'Imperium. Une chance que votre Exalté vous protège, sans quoi je vous aurais déjà brûlée vive dans les flammes sacrées ! »

languages.text: "Ich würde niemals erlauben, dass Euresgleichen auch nur einen Finger an wahre Macht legt! Ihr seid ein Geschwür im Körper des Imperiums – dankt Eurem Erhabenen, dass ich Euch noch nicht mit rechtschaffenen Flammen in Brand gesteckt habe!"
languages.original_text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde niemals erlauben, dass Euresgleichen auch nur einen Finger an wahre Macht legt! Ihr seid ein Geschwür im Körper des Imperiums – dankt Eurem Erhabenen, dass ich Euch noch nicht mit rechtschaffenen Flammen in Brand gesteckt habe!"

languages.text: "Senin gibi birisinin gerçek güçle yakından uzaktan bir ilgisi olmasına asla izin vermem. İmparatorluk'un bedeninde çıban gibi bitmişsin... Görkemli'ne şükret de henüz erdemli alevlerimle seni yakıp kül etmedim!"
languages.original_text: "I would never allow your ilk to lay so much as a finger on true power! You are an ulcer on the body of the Imperium — thank your Exalted One that I have not yet incinerated you in righteous flame!"

traits.locale_text: "Senin gibi birisinin gerçek güçle yakından uzaktan bir ilgisi olmasına asla izin vermem. İmparatorluk'un bedeninde çıban gibi bitmişsin... Görkemli'ne şükret de henüz erdemli alevlerimle seni yakıp kül etmedim!"
